```sh
      # List all PDF and DOCX files
ls *.{pdf,docx}

# List files starting with 'test' followed by a single digit
ls test?.log

# List all files starting with uppercase letters
ls [A-Z]*

# List all hidden configuration files
ls .config* 

```
